items.name: OnePlan Protection
items.text: With OnePlan Protection, we can help you protect your family's income with life insurance, but also if you can't work because of illness or injury.

items.name: Income Protection
items.text: With Income Protection you will receive a replacement income if you cannot work due to illness or injury after a certain period of time.

items.name: Mortgage Protections
items.text: With Mortgage Protection you can be assured your mortgage will be protected and paid off in cases of death or illness.

items.name: Whole of Life Insurance
items.text: With Mortgage Protection you can be assured your mortgage will be protected and paid off in cases of death or illness.
